title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit

A simple, small fire you can enjoy on your table. Easy to use. Safe to touch around the outside. Light it for a cosy glow or to toast a marshmallow.

What it is:
- A mini fire pit made from strong concrete in a dark graphite color with a marble-look base.
- It runs on clean bio-ethanol fuel. No wood, no smoke, and no soot.

Easy to use:
- Place it on a flat, steady surface, indoors or in the garden.
- Fill the stainless-steel cup with bio-ethanol fuel.
- Light it with a long lighter or match.
- To put it out, simply cover the flame with the included flat metal tool.
- Burns for over 1 hour on a full cup.

Safe by design:
- Heat-dissipating base helps protect your table.
- Stainless-steel burn cup with safety features to reduce flashback and leaks.
- Rapid-cooling burn chamber cools down faster after use.
- Sturdy and portable, so you can move it when it’s fully cool.

Comfort and fun:
- Creates a warm, cosy atmosphere for dinners, reading, or relaxing.
- Great for simple treats like s’mores and marshmallows.

Helpful tips:
- Use Roundfire premium bio-ethanol fuel for best results.
- Keep children, pets, curtains, and papers away from the flame.
- Never refill while it is hot or still burning—wait until it is completely cool.
- Use on a heat-resistant surface and keep a window slightly open if used indoors.

What you get:
- Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit (mini size).
- Stainless-steel burn cup with ceramic wool inside to help it burn longer and more evenly.
- Flat stainless-steel tool to safely extinguish the flame.

Bring gentle, flickering light and comfort to your home with a fire that’s easy to start, easy to stop, and easy to enjoy.
